About Me

My introduction

👋 Hello, I'm Karthikeyan P, a Python and SQL Developer passionate about clean code, database optimization, and AI-driven solutions. I have a Master’s in Computer Applications (MCA) and hands-on experience in web development, AI, and data science.Currently, I work as a Python Developer at Outliers AI, building intelligent software solutions. I thrive on problem-solving, teamwork, and continuous learning.🚀 Open to exciting opportunities in software engineering and AI!
